game.name: Secrets of Egypt
game.shortDescription: Secrets of Egypt is a casual puzzle game made in 2D graphics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Secrets of Egypt is a casual puzzle game made in 2D graphics.

reviewHighlights.text: Spoiler alert: "Secrets of Egypt" doesn't contain any secrets at all. Instead it's a lame Game Maker Studio ripoff of Zuma, down to the egyptian visua...
Extremely disappointing The when you clear a color out, you still get new balls in that color Additionally, when you remove balls from the snake of ba...
